about_the_game:
Jack be Nimble! Jack be Quick!

You've delved into the world of platformers, witnessed the evolution of speedrunning games, and sought the satisfaction of precision gameplay, we proudly present Swift By Knight. It's the daring fusion of contemporary speedrunning games (Super Meat Boy, Celeste, Dustforce, etc.) and classic 2D platformers (such as Super Mario Bros and Mega Man). Prepare yourself for an exhilarating journey that combines the best elements of both genres, delivering a thrilling and fast-paced experience.


Features:

  • Speedrun: Embark on a lightning-fast adventure through meticulously designed levels, mastering the art of speedrunning as a medieval knight.
  • Grapple Mastery: Harness the power of a versatile grapple hook, allowing you to swing, soar, and traverse the levels with precision and finesse.
  • Bounce Off Enemies: Engage in exhilarating combat encounters, using attacks to bounce yourself off enemies at strategic opportunities to maintain your momentum and propel yourself forward.
  • Slay Foes: Execute precise attacks using various weapons to slay enemies creatively while maintaining your speed.
  • Workshop Content and Level Editor: Unleash your creativity with a robust level editor, allowing you to craft your own unique challenges and share them with the Swift By Knight community. Dive into an ever-growing library of user-generated content and mods, expanding the possibilities of your adventure.
  • Leaderboard Competition: Compete with friends and players from around the world for the best times and scores. Climb the ranks on the leaderboard, showcasing your mastery and challenging others to beat your best times.

In the realm of Swift By Knight, your prowess as a player reigns supreme! The essence of speedrunning games lies in continual improvement, turning once insurmountable challenges into mere child's play.

short_description: Swift by Knight is a 2D platformer that puts you in control of Jack, the Nimble Knight, on a quest for speed and precision. Bounce off enemies, grapple, and utilize the unique level mechanics to navigate with speed and finesse.
